name: Rascals
description: Welcome to the wonderful world of Rascals, the VR board game where you take first person control of your pieces to play tricks on the opposition. It plays much like any other board game where you throw dice to move your pieces, until you sneak up on one of your opponents and shoot him in the head.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
